a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile," said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google. The company also announced that starting April 4, Larry Page, Google Co-Founder, will take charge of company's day-to-day operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman.
